title: Smoked salmon, dill & lemon paté
directions: If you aren’t using smoked salmon trimmings then chop the salmon into small pieces. Tip the soft cheese, crème fraîche (if using) and lemon juice into a food processor, season generously with black pepper and blitz to your liking. Add the smoked salmon and pulse a few times if you want the paté chunky or blitz some more if you want the paté smooth and pink.
Stir the herbs into the paté and spoon into a large or four smaller bowls and serve with warm toast as a starter or with breadsticks as a dip.
ingredients: 1 tbsp crème fraîche, only if you have some
small bunch dill or chives, chopped
breadsticks or granary toast, to serv
